name: サチ江-死道
description:
A woman who works for a black company in the mountains.

Although I have only one week left until I retire,

I get up on the usual way I used to go home... mysterious...

Is it possible to survive safely for a week?

Who is "Sachie"?

Why is a woman (hero) being attacked?

A Japanese horror game from the first person perspective!

The key to capture is not to make noise. Headphones recommended
